textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 05/31/2013 “There’s a lot of different stuff I may have the opportunity to do,” Kidd said. “If I play, I plan on playing for the Knicks. I got to be honest with myself. I’m a young man. (But) I got to see if I could still mentally do the grind all over again.” Knicks Point Guard Jason Kidd Undecided If He Will Play 2013-2014 Season 06/10/2013 Kidd is interested in Brooklyn’ coaching position and plans to talk to the team this week, a person familiar with the situation told The Associated Press on Sunday.
